name: Healthy Multigrain Chia Waffles
author: TNCook
summary: These waffles are a little bit crunchy and super filling, with ingredients proven to regulate blood sugar. The chia seeds and flax add extra fiber and Omega-3 to your diet. My kids love these waffles with chocolate chips!
ingredients: 2 teaspoons white sugar, or more to taste
directions: Preheat a waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions; spray the inside with cooking spray
Whisk almond milk, applesauce, egg, chia seeds, and vanilla extract together in a bowl; let sit until chia seeds start to thicken the mixture, about 2 minutes
Whisk flour, oats, flax seed meal, baking powder, sugar, and salt into almond milk mixture until batter is smooth
Scoop 1/2 cup batter into the preheated waffle iron and cook until crisp and golden, about 5 minutes per waffle
